description: Product SpecificationGYM DUMBBELL ROD :Adjustable dumbbell set made of CNC Pipe filled with concrete .Zinc applied on the surface of rod.Dumbbell rod thickness:20 mmWEIGHT OF BOTH ROD:8900 gNO OF NUTS:5(4 NUTS+1 EXTRA)WEIGHT CAPACITY OF EACH ROD:30 KgBEST FOR:A muscular exercise and strength training equipment best for home gym workoutGYM WEIGHT PLATES10 kg(2.5 kg x 4 ) pvc weight plates have rigid plastic shell mad of plastic pvc material filled with concreteInner Whole of dumbbell plates:23 mmHome gym:Gym equipment ,home fitness kit comes with gym accessories for home gym workout
